title: Other quality graphic design forums?
content:
Hi all,

Just wondering if anyone could point me into the direction of any high quality more graphic design based forums.

Any help would be great
author: TF22Raptor

comments.content:
[http://www.designobserver.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131123423/http:/www.designobserver.com/ "http://www.designobserver.com/")  
The greatest of them all. Period.

These forums are pretty good, [http://www.designateonline.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131123423/http:/www.designateonline.com/ "http://www.designateonline.com") not sure if you'll think they're at a high enough quality tho...

I have found no other better than these. Designertalk comes close but has too many people that are pissed off or make snippy comments. I think they are just taking out their frustrations about their clients on the boards.
